casebody.data:
THE LAKE WILSON. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit May 5, 1924.) No. 336. Carter, Ledyard & Milburn, of New York City (J. M. Richardson Lyeth and Rush Taggart, Jr., both of New York City, of counsel), for libelants appellees, Hoyt and others and Tattersfield Co. Richard Reid Rogers, of New York City, for claimant. Bigham, Englar & Jones, of New York City (Osear R. Houston and Henry T. Hale, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellees Crimmins & Peirce Co., G. Amsinck & Co., Mauger & Avery, and Pablo Calyet Co.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
